alert.note: Alert for Eaton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:23PM EDT until August 03 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eaton County in south central Michigan... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 523 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles west of Charlotte, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lansing... Charlotte... Eaton Rapids... Grand Ledge... Potterville... Nashville... Bellevue... Kalamo... Olivet... Brookfield... Dimondale... Vermontville... Sunfield... Mulliken... Waverly... Gresham... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
